/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban and natural elements.
